content: *bursting with color this easy-to-make afghan is simply a series of squares within squares lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 60202ad corrections applied jan 25 2007 skill level easy level 2 wool-ease® article #620 10 colors 17 balls total crochet hook - size i-9 gauge rounds 1-3 of square = 4 in 10 cm work 50 rounds of alternating colors weave in ends to finish see also 90236ad wexford granny afghan 1 6 colors 16 balls total wool-ease 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/wexford-granny-afghan
